Room.Name: Goblin Priest's Lair
Room.ShortDescription: You have wondered into the dimly lit goblin priest's lair.
Room.LongDescription: Several small half melted candels are scattered throughout the room provide the only means of light. Along the walls you see various crudely made religous symbols for the goblin god Maglubiyet. The room is filled with scent of putrid smelling insents. In the middle of the room you see a goblin priest reciting the words to a golbin prayer.
